context_bundle.summary: STRYK workstation hardware configuration tracking. Documents current specs, upgrade path, and system considerations for the PhiVector development rig.

onboarding.quick_start: Check specs: sigcon6 sig_sysinfo. GPU status: nvidia-smi (in System32). RAM slots: Get-CimInstance Win32_PhysicalMemory
common_patterns: Get-CimInstance Win32_PhysicalMemory | Select BankLabel, Capacity, Speed
known_errors: PCIe shows Gen 1 at idle - normal power saving, negotiates up under load
Z170 max PCIe 3.0 - 5070 Ti works but bottlenecked vs Gen 4/5
nvidia-smi in C:\Windows\System32 not NVSMI folder on newer drivers
